===Proper noun===
{{zh-proper noun}}

# {{lb|zh|archaic}} [[w:Wugong, Shaanxi|Tai Village]] (located in present day [[w:Wugong, Shaanxi|Wugong County, Shaanxi]])

===Usage notes===
[[斄]] was the character originally used in [[w:Records of Three Kingdoms|Records of Three Kingdoms]]. In the Mao Zonggang edition of [[w:Romance of the Three Kingdoms|Romance of the Three Kingdoms]], [[鰲]] was used in its place. When used in this place name, [[斄]] is Tái rather than lì.
